privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Brat Generator
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Brat Generator ("we", "our", or "the site"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you understand how we collect, use, and protect your information. This Privacy Policy outlines our data collection and usage practices when you visit our website and use our generator tools.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content:
The information we may collect includes:
  • Usage Data: Information about how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, referring site, date and time of access, and pages you visit.
  • Device Information: Information about the device you use to access our website, including hardware model, operating system and version, and unique device identifiers.
  • Cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your interactions with our website.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use the information we collect to:
  • Provide, maintain, and improve our website and services;
  • Monitor and analyze website usage and trends;
  • Enhance the security of the website;
  • Detect, prevent, and address technical issues.

sections.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sections.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
  • Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers that provide IT and system administration services.
  • Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law, such as to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process.
  • Protection of Rights: We may disclose your information to protect our rights, property, or safety, as well as the rights, property, or safety of our users or others.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect the personal information we collect from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, please note that no method of data transmission or internet storage is 100% secure.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
  • Access personal information we hold about you;
  • Request correction of inaccurate data;
  • Request deletion of your personal information;
  • Object to our processing of your personal information;
  • Request restriction of processing of your personal information;
  • Request transfer of your personal information to another organization.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated version on this page. We recommend that you review this policy periodically for any changes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our
Contact Page
